ai-tha-ap266:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap266:2.2_0: in lampsed in the same way
ai-tha-ap266:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap266:2.4_0: this gift is the fruit of giving,
ai-tha-ap266:3.2_0: I was the one great hermit.
ai-tha-ap266:3.3_0: by the seer, the Visionary One,
ai-tha-ap266:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable lamp.
ai-tha-ap266:6.1_0: he took a lamp on the fourth Elder Nun Previously
